summary: Experience the show that quickly became a national phenomenon, and get an up close and personal look at Kevin Hart back in Philly, where he began his journey to become one of the funniest comedians of all time. You will laugh 'til it hurts.
cast: Kevin Hart|Taraji P. Henson|Will 'Spank' Horton|Harry Ratchford|Na'im Lynn|Dwayne L. Brown|Nathan L. Smith|Joey Wells|Jeanette Branch|Franklin Ruehl|Isaac C. Singleton Jr.|Pierre Antonio|Douglas Griffin|Joe Gonzalez|Larry King|Dave Becky|Jim Ellis|Tu Rae Gordon|Robert K. Hart|Justin Key|Keith Robinson|Henry Witherspoon|Nicole Alexander|Ryan Howard|DeSean Jackson|Boris Kodjoe|Sanaa Lathan|Shaquille O'Neal|Nicole Ari Parker|Stephen A. Smith
keywords: stand up comedian|stand up|stand up comedy
title: Kevin Hart: Laugh at My Pain
